General.Name: Avary Holding Shenzhen Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Avary Holding(Shenzhen)Co., Limited engages in the research and development, design, manufacture, and sale of printed circuit boards in China. Its products are used in communication, consumer electronic and computer, and automotive electronics and industrial control industries. Avary Holding(Shenzhen)Co., Limited was founded in 1999 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

2.Name: Ms. Hong  Zhou
2.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
